description:
When it comes to saving money online, Amazon is already one of the best marketplaces to turn to. Its sheer scale makes its prices hard to compete with. Factor in its wide product variety, membership perks from Amazon Prime, and the Subscribe and Save feature, and it’s easy to see why people love shopping at this e-commerce giant.

However, despite competitive prices and programs like Amazon Prime, shopping on Amazon can still be expensive. If you aren’t careful, an online shopping binge or two will seriously hurt your bank account.

Thankfully, there are plenty of ways to earn free gift cards to put a dent in your Amazon spending.

Ways to Earn Free Amazon Gift Cards
If you want to save more money each month without giving up the joys of shopping on Amazon, the following methods of earning Amazon gift cards for free are your best options.

1. Take Surveys Through Survey Websites
Answering surveys for money is not a high-paying online job. In fact, survey websites are one of the lowest-paying side gigs around.

However, survey websites provide a way to make extra money in your spare time. Many popular survey websites also let users redeem their account balance for free Amazon gift cards.

Survey websites don’t pay a high hourly rate. Disqualifications, running out of surveys, and offers randomly not crediting are also obstacles. However, in terms of earning free Amazon gift cards, survey sites are a viable option that doesn’t require much effort or any upfront cost.

If you have some spare time and don’t mind repetitive survey work, there are several legitimate survey websites that make it easy to earn free Amazon gif
